translation.en: [woman] I often think… marriage is like the ocean.
translation.zh: 我经常觉得婚姻就像海洋

translation.en: At its best, it's the most glorious thing in the world.
translation.zh: 在最好的时候 它世界上最壮丽的事物

translation.en: Deep with desire… majestic…
yet gentle.
Just pure magic.
But when it's like…
[woman] Marriage is hectic. Like one lucky packet it is.
translation.zh: 婚姻是紧张而忙碌的 它就像一个幸运包

translation.en: You don't know what you're gonna get.
translation.zh: 你不知道自己会得到什么

translation.en: What do you think?
About?
My hair.
Oh… okay.
Mm-hmm…
How much you paid for it?
Eight hundred.
They ripped you off, huh?
You should try my barber.
translation.zh: 你应该试试我的理发师

translation.en: [woman] Marriage can also be like one big tsunami.
translation.zh: 婚姻也可以像一场大海啸

translation.en: That wave will come from nowhere. You don't know what hit you, man.
translation.zh: 那些波浪凭空出现 你不知道击中你的会是什么

translation.en: Shanti, so short you cut my fingernails.
translation.zh: 尚蒂 你把我的指甲剪得太短了

translation.en: Ah, she made a top breakfast.
translation.zh: 她做了一顿丰盛的早餐

translation.en: Yeah. She don't mind.
[woman] Yeah, marriage can be like a cup of tea.
translation.zh: 好吧 婚姻也像是一杯茶

translation.en: Shanti, organize me a cup of tea.
translation.zh: 尚蒂 给我倒一杯茶

translation.en: [woman] Sometimes strong or sometimes weak.
translation.zh: 有时很浓烈 有时很寡淡

translation.en: And you ask yourself, "Hey, what happened here?"
translation.zh: 你会问你自己：“这是怎么回事？”

translation.en: What are you doing? Giving those ribbons a perm?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？给这些丝带烫头发吗？

translation.en: You know, I can't wait for the day that I become a proud Aya.
translation.zh: 我真的好期待能成为一个骄傲的阿娅

translation.en: Hey, there's only one Aya in this town,
translation.zh: 喂 这城里只有一个阿娅…

translation.en: and she is not dead yet.
You know, they'll be here soon.
[Aya] Can I help you all?
No, you just sit there and help Desan blow those balloons.
translation.zh: 不用 你就坐在那儿帮德桑吹气球吧

translation.en: I'm on my last few breaths, and you want I must blow balloons.
translation.zh: 我就剩最后几口气了 你还要我吹气球

translation.en: Very untidy, Shanti.
translation.zh: 这袋子绑得真乱 尚蒂

translation.en: No, it isn't.
-Very untidy. -No, it isn't.
Look at this. You do it.
Hey, did you look at the list of baby names from our moms?
translation.zh: 嘿 你看过我们的妈妈给孩子 列的那些名字吗？

translation.en: Agh… [chuckles]
-So Jennifer and Shanti. -[chuckles]
When we are gonna be parents, we are doing things our way.
translation.zh: 等我们当了父母 我们按自己的方式安排

translation.en: You got new shoes bro, huh?
Huh… wanna get a good look, Brazzo.
translation.zh: 你想有个好形象吧 哥们

translation.en: -[laughing] -Oh gosh!
[scoffs] "Wanna take a good look, Brazzo?"
translation.zh: “你想有个好形象吧 哥们”

translation.en: As for Preggie, I don't know whether he's calling "Shanti" or "I want tea".
translation.zh: 普雷吉也是 不知道是在叫“尚蒂” 还是在说“我要喝茶”

translation.en: He… [sighs]
You're stressed?
No, I didn't eat this morning.
Hmm, way to go, Shanti. Intermittent fasting.
translation.zh: 好样的 尚蒂 间歇性断食

translation.en: Where I got time for 'intermission' fasting and all this thing
translation.zh: 普雷吉不停地邀请客人到家里来

translation.en: when Preggie keeps inviting people home?
translation.zh: 我还怎么间歇性断食啊？

translation.en: No. Again?
Preggie is an ass.
[Shanti] If he is happy, then I am happy.
translation.zh: 如果他开心 我就开心

translation.en: I think.
Okay, I don't know.
-Listen, we have a plan, remember? -Hmm.
translation.zh: -我们有个计划 记得吗？ -记得

translation.en: It's your 50th birthday.
It's a couples-only holiday.
This is the holiday when we get our husbands back.
translation.zh: 是一个让我们找回丈夫的假期

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Elvis] Brazzo, this is the holiday
translation.zh: -是啊 -哥们 这是一个我们可以躲开老婆的假期 对吧？

translation.en: where we dodge the wives, huh?
translation.zh: 这是一个我们可以躲开老婆的假期 对吧？

translation.en: [gasps] Guys, they are here. Preggie, Elvis, come!
translation.zh: 各位 他们来了 普雷吉 埃尔维斯 来

translation.en: -Aya, come on. Let's go. -Mama, come on. Come on.
translation.zh: -阿娅 过来 -妈妈 来啊

translation.en: Come on.
Come here. You're gonna drop her. Oh.
translation.zh: 亚萨万 你会摔到她的

translation.en: I don't even know how these two managed to make a baby,
translation.zh: 他们两个都没跟对方说话

translation.en: and they haven't even said a word to each other.
translation.zh: 真不知道他们是怎么有孩子的

translation.en: You don't need to talk for that.
translation.zh: 不用说话就可以怀孩子

translation.en: [gasps] Oh man! Look at how cute they look.
translation.zh: 天啊 他们两个多漂亮

translation.en: Pregnancy looks good on her.
Nice to see you suddenly so observant, Elvis.
translation.zh: 看到你突然变得这么敏锐 我很高兴 埃尔维斯

translation.en: Huh?
Hey, what happened?
Menopause.
I think Jodi and Prishen will have a baby soon.
translation.zh: 我觉得约迪和普里什很快就会有孩子

translation.en: Yeah, hopefully.
It will be the best 50th present ever.
translation.zh: -这会是我最棒的50岁生日礼物 -我知道

translation.en: -I know. -Shanti. Shanti.
translation.zh: -这会是我最棒的50岁生日礼物 -我知道 尚蒂

translation.en: I'll have some tea.
Make for Elvis too.
Just wait a minute.
-It's contagious, bro. -Hmm.
Half teaspoon sugar and extra milk for me and boil the milk.
translation.zh: 给我加半勺糖 多加牛奶 牛奶要煮开

translation.en: Where are we gonna leave Aya when we go on this trip?
translation.zh: 我们去旅行时 要让阿娅待在哪儿呢？

translation.en: I wanna come too. I don't want to go stay by my connections.
translation.zh: 我想跟你们一起去旅行 我不想跟熟人待在一起

translation.en: You can stay at Shanti's house with Arsevan and Poobasha.
translation.zh: 你可以住在尚蒂家 跟亚萨万和碧帕莎一起住

translation.en: See, Elvis? She want I must die.
translation.zh: -是啊 -看见了吗 埃尔维斯？她要我死

translation.en: Ma, please. If that's what I wanted, you would be long gone.
translation.zh: 妈妈 别这么说 如果我真这么想 那你早就过世了

translation.en: -[Elvis] Now. -[Jennifer] She started it.
You all must read in the paper for my funeral message.
translation.zh: 你们一定都要在报纸上 读我葬礼的留言

translation.en: Classifications. Page number two.
Mother of Elvis Kandasamy, 80 something,
translation.zh: “埃尔维斯坎德萨米的母亲 现年80多岁

translation.en: heart of gold, gone too soon.
translation.zh: 有一颗金子般的心 过早逝去

translation.en: She ran out of luck but was not out for a duck.
translation.zh: 她的运气用光了 却没有零分出局”

translation.en: Why I must bloody boil the milk…
translation.zh: 我为什么一定要把牛奶煮开？

translation.en: Boil it on her damn head.
Hey. She takes a bit long to answer.
Fifty bucks they'll ask when we're gonna have a baby.
translation.zh: 我赌50块钱 他们一定会问我们什么时候要孩子

translation.en: -Oh, you're on. -[laughs]
Come quick. Quick.
Hey.
I'm warning the two of you. No asking them about having children and all that.
translation.zh: 我警告你们两个 别问他们要不要孩子什么的

translation.en: -Yeah, every time you say the same thing. -There they are.
translation.zh: 好了 你每次都这么说 好了 接通了

translation.en: -Hi! -Hello.
Hi, everyone.
We were just talking about you all.
How was the baby shower?
So lovely. Jodi, your face is looking so, uh, full.
translation.zh: 很不错 约迪 你的脸看起来很饱满

translation.en: Shh.
What? I didn't say anything.
-[Aya] Let me say hello. -Hey, Aya.
You hold it in front.
translation.zh: 这样拿着 放在前面

translation.en: -There you are. -Hello.
Tell me something, when I'm going to become a great grandmother?
translation.zh: 跟我说说 我什么时候能当曾祖母？

translation.en: [Jennifer] Don't. Really. Give me that.
translation.zh: 别提这个 把手机给我

translation.en: [Aya] You didn't tell me I mustn't say it.
translation.zh: -你没说我不能问 -对 但是埃尔维斯说过

translation.en: Elvis told all of us not to say anything, and you had to go blurt it out.
translation.zh: -你没说我不能问 -对 但是埃尔维斯说过 我们大家都不能说 而你就这么脱口而出了

translation.en: Hey, I can't hold anything in. Just like I can't hold a fart at my age.
translation.zh: 嘿 我憋不住事儿 像我这个年纪憋不住屁一样

translation.en: Shut up. They're still on the line.
translation.zh: 闭嘴吧 他们还听着呢

translation.en: Ma, we've got some good news.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我们有个好消息

translation.en: -Oh my God. It's happening. -Your birthday wish is coming true.
translation.zh: 天啊 成真了 你的生日愿望成真了

translation.en: I just knew it.
Guys, calm down first.
We are calm, absolutely calm.
My second name is Calm-la.
We're coming home for Diwali.
Wow. Wow, that… that is so nice.
It's fantastic.
Well, Jodi and I discussed it, and…
Well, we're sorry about missing your birthday, Ma.
translation.zh: 我跟约迪商量过了 我们很抱歉不能回去给你过生日

translation.en: Hey, the two of you, you all do a lot of discussing, huh?
translation.zh: 嘿 你们两个会讨论很多事吧？

translation.en: Marriage 101, guys. -Communication is key. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 《婚姻101》里说过 沟通是婚姻幸福的钥匙

translation.en: Tell me something, Prishen. How I am gonna be a great grandmother
translation.zh: 普里什 你告诉我 我怎样才能成为曾祖母呢？

translation.en: if you don't put your key… You know what I mean, eh?
translation.zh: 如果你不把你的钥匙放在… 你明白我的意思

translation.en: Oh my God. Ma. Really, really?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 妈妈 不是吧

translation.en: Okay, we're gonna get going,
translation.zh: 我先挂了 我们很快会见面

translation.en: -but we'll see you guys soon. -[all] Bye.
translation.zh: 我先挂了 我们很快会见面 -再见 -再见

translation.en: -Love you. Bye. -Bye.
Wow.
Really Ma. I mean, you're so raw.
translation.zh: 真是的 妈妈 太露骨了

translation.en: I mean, there's no other word to describe it. It's just raw.
translation.zh: 我没有别的词可以形容这种行为 就是露骨

translation.en: [Shanti] I just packed easy things so the guys can cook for us.
translation.zh: 我只是带了点简单的东西 这样他们就会给我们做饭

translation.en: Do you know Preggie has never cooked for me?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？普雷吉从来没给我做过饭

translation.en: [Jennifer] Hmm, so how does it make you feel?
The idea of him cooking for you.
[clicks tongue] Okay, so my ears get hot.
translation.zh: 好吧 我的耳朵发烫

translation.en: And I get so shy.
Oh my God, you just said he turns you on. Turns you on, right?
translation.zh: 天啊 你刚刚说他会让你兴奋 对吧？

translation.en: Hmm…
Shanti is getting turned on.
Shut up, man, Jen. Anyway, what naughty things you got?
translation.zh: 闭嘴吧 你准备了什么下流的小玩意儿？

translation.en: I will show you when I see you.
Shame and sadist.
Jennifer too. You slushy.
translation.zh: 珍妮弗也是 真粗俗

translation.en: Ma, I can hear you. Put the phone down now.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我能听到你说话 快把电话放下

translation.en: Oh…
-Shanti is there with you. -Put the phone down, Ma.
translation.zh: 你在跟尚蒂说话啊 妈妈 把电话放下

translation.en: [sighs] Oh God, Shanti. Just can't wait to get away from this woman.
translation.zh: 天啊 尚蒂 我真想早点摆脱这个女人

translation.en: Some peace finally. Just one more sleep.
translation.zh: 只要再过一晚 我就终于能获得平静了

translation.en: -Us and our peace. -Yeah, just us.
translation.zh: -我们的平静生活 -是啊 只有我们

translation.en: And me too?
Ma, put the phone down now. Now!
translation.zh: 妈妈 立刻放下电话

translation.en: Ma!
So all your food is in the freezer, Okay, my baby?
translation.zh: 食物都在冰箱里 知道吗 宝贝？

translation.en: And Arsevan will take care of you, Okay, my darling?
translation.zh: 亚萨万会照顾你的 好吗？

translation.en: Hey Desan, my sweetheart.
-Good day. -Yeah, space.
[Shanti] Now this one.
-How many more bags are there? -Nothing else.
translation.zh: 一共有多少个包？ 没别的了

translation.en: -Shanti, Shanti. -What?
They're checking us out. Don't look. Act normal.
translation.zh: 他们在看我们 别看他们 表现得正常一点

translation.en: -Okay. -Just pose.
translation.zh: -好 -摆个姿势 展现一下屁股

translation.en: -Pose that bum. -Pose. Uh…
[Elvis] Hey, Check out those curves, bro.
translation.zh: 嘿 看看这曲线 老兄

translation.en: Look at her, bro. Whoa.
translation.zh: 快看啊 哥们 天啊

translation.en: -Don't look. -[Preggie] Yo! Yo!
I love big curves. Yo, yo.
[Elvis] There's a whole lot of sexy going on here.
Hey, bro, wait till you take it for a ride.
translation.zh: 嘿 哥们 等你上去就知道了

translation.en: [Aya] Jennifer.
[Jennifer] What, Ma?
Forgot something?
What?
Me.
-Shucks. -It's okay. I won't need it.
translation.zh: -糟了 -没关系 我不需要你

translation.en: Okay.
[Elvis] Check this…
Hey, what time you guys leaving?
translation.zh: 嘿 你们俩什么时候走？

translation.en: Oh, we're gonna drop Mom off first, and then, uh…
we pick up a few things, and then we hit the road.
What few things?
It's a surprise.
Just for the two of you.
translation.zh: 给你们两个人准备的惊喜

translation.en: Well, don't faff around, boys. We'll be waiting.
translation.zh: 别瞎晃悠 我们等你们

translation.en: [Shanti] Whoo! What a joy!
-We're going on a trip! -[cheering] I cannot believe it!
translation.zh: -我们开始旅行了 -真不敢相信

translation.en: We need something to munch on.
[Jennifer] You can talk to me if you need to open your mouth.
translation.zh: 如果你要张嘴 可以跟我说话

translation.en: Hi Mrs. Kandasamy. Welcome back to San Lameer.
translation.zh: 你好 坎德萨米夫人 欢迎回到圣拉梅尔

translation.en: Thank you, Pierre. Always lovely to be back.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 皮埃尔 回到这里总是很开心

translation.en: -[Pierre] The usual? -Fantastic.
-I'll do it right away. -[Jennifer] Thank you.
translation.zh: 我马上为您准备 好极了 谢谢你 皮埃尔

translation.en: Wow!
Welcome to your holiday home.
I have no words. Whoa.
And wait for it. You guys are gonna get the main bedroom suite.
translation.zh: 等着吧 你们两个住主卧套房

translation.en: You're joking, man.
I absolutely insist.
Elvis and I are gonna be on the opposite side,
translation.zh: 我和埃尔维斯住在你们对面

translation.en: so that we don't disturb you guys.
Don't worry about that.
Preggie likes to play loud R&B music when he gets in the mood.
translation.zh: 普雷吉兴致来了 就喜欢放很吵的节奏蓝调乐

translation.en: Aha!
[sighs] I just love this.
Ah, me too. This is the life, Shanti. -Hmm. -Peace.
translation.zh: 我也是 这才是生活 尚蒂 宁静的感觉

translation.en: Hold on. Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Listen.
What?
Can you hear Aya?
No.
Exactly!
[Prishen] This is so beautiful.
Wow. What a fantastic villa.
We're the first ones here.
-[laughs] -I'm tall enough.
-Oh. -Mm.
Elvis literally carried me in front of everyone,
translation.zh: 埃尔维斯在所有人面前把我抱了起来

translation.en: pinned me against the wall and just kissed me.
translation.zh: 然后把我按在墙上亲吻我

translation.en: [Shanti] Ooh. He pinned you?
Exactly.
And that pin never poked you?
translation.zh: 就没什么东西戳到你吗？

translation.en: -Shanti. You're such a… -[laughs]
Preggie kissed me in the toilet…
translation.zh: 普雷吉在厕所里吻了我

translation.en: And?
What's that?
It's them. It's them. Come on. Let's make an entrance.
translation.zh: 是他们 走吧 我们要登场了

translation.en: Hi.
Hey. What happened? I don't know.
translation.zh: 嘿 发生什么事了？ 我不知道你们在这儿

translation.en: [hesitates] What y'all doing here?
translation.zh: 你们两个在这儿干什么？

translation.en: Uh, it's, um… It's-it's-it's a… It's a surprise for you guys.
Yeah. I-- I don't understand.
-Um, uh… -[whispers] The dads.
Uh, Uncle Elvis and Dad planned… planned this for us to be here on your birthday. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 埃尔维斯叔叔和我爸爸 让我们在你过生日这天来这里

translation.en: This is the surprise?
[chuckles] Yeah.
Oh, wow.
Yeah. Wow.
Are you… are you guys okay?
Wow. I'm shocked. Sur… surprised! I'm surprised, shocked, surpri…
translation.zh: 真是惊吓 惊喜 我很惊喜 惊吓 惊…

translation.en: -Uh, yeah. We're so excited. -Excited…
Come, give your mothers a hug. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 来吧 让妈妈们抱抱

translation.en: -How are you, Prishen? -Good.
Speaking of it, bro, you put foot on it that last stretch, man.
translation.zh: 说到这个 最后那一下你把脚放上去了

translation.en: Yo.
[Shanti] Hey, you really surprised us.
translation.zh: 嘿 你们真是让我们惊喜啊 是吧？

translation.en: -Hi, boy. -How is it, Dad?
translation.zh: -嗨 儿子 -你好吗 爸爸？

translation.en: What's wrong with you? You were supposed to wait for us.
translation.zh: 嘿 你怎么回事？ 你应该等我们的

translation.en: -So sorry about our timing, Dad. -Hey.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我们时间出差错了 爸爸 -等一下

translation.en: You packed more than us.
translation.zh: 他们打包的东西比我们还多

translation.en: Why so many bags?
The whole family is here. [chuckles]
I can see the whole family is here. Stop poking me.
translation.zh: 我看到全家人都来了 别戳我了

translation.en: Jennifer, your leg is not paining you?
translation.zh: 詹妮弗 你的腿不疼吗？

translation.en: Why?
Because I pulled your leg nicely. You thought I wasn't gonna come, isn't it?
translation.zh: 因为我紧抓着你的腿不放 你没想到我会来吧？

translation.en: [scoffs] And that thought is still in my head.
translation.zh: 是啊 我现在也没想到

translation.en: Okay, the surprise isn't over. Elvis, give us a drum roll.
translation.zh: 好了 惊喜环节结束了 埃尔维斯 来一段开场鼓吧

translation.en: Tada. Shanti, this one's for you.
translation.zh: 瞧啊 尚蒂 为你准备的

translation.en: My sister.
In law. [clears throat] In law. Sister-in-law.
-OMG, but you are gorgeous. -Thank you.
And look at you, all grown up. So handsome.
translation.zh: 你都长这么大了 变成大帅哥了

translation.en: Hey Preggie, the Naidoo blood is strong over here.
translation.zh: 嘿 普雷吉 我们奈杜家的基因很强大

translation.en: He's got my ears.
[Jennifer] So, you're Preggie's sister?
Baby, this is my best friend and, uh, my sister, Jennifer, Elvis's wife.
translation.zh: 贝贝 这是我最好的朋友詹妮弗 她是埃尔维斯的妻子

translation.en: You are beautiful.
Oh, thank you.
I hope one day I get to age as gracefully as you do.
translation.zh: 我真希望有一天 我也能像你这样优雅地老去

translation.en: Elvis… did you know about this?
translation.zh: 埃尔维斯 你事先知道吗？

translation.en: Yeah, uh, Preggie asked me, and I said yes.
translation.zh: 知道 普雷吉问过我的意见 我同意了

translation.en: It's an eight sleeper.
Huh?
It's an eight sleeper!
Hey, you don't know, for Indians, you double the number. Eight is 16. 16, 32.
translation.zh: 嘿 你不知道 对印度人来说 实际人数是规定人数的两倍

translation.en: Lot of people we manage, all can squeeze in.
translation.zh: 能住很多人 大家都能挤进来

translation.en: -So, Elvis, this place is yours, right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -埃尔维斯 这房子是你的吧？ -对

translation.en: It's ours.
It's ours.
Tall and you know how to rev an engine.
translation.zh: 你个子这么高 还这么让人着迷

translation.en: Seriously, Jen, I am jealous.
translation.zh: 说真的 我真嫉妒你 詹妮弗

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay. Anybody is hungry?
We all are.
Listen to me nicely, all right?
This is so ridiculous. I don't know what to say.
translation.zh: 真是太荒唐了 我都不知道该说什么

translation.en: [Aya] If the gulgulas are not round,
then the gulab jamun will always face to the ground.
translation.zh: 那玫瑰奶球总是会脸朝地

translation.en: Ma.
[Jennifer] Did you see Preggie? Smiling like a Cheshire cat, and Elvis…
translation.zh: 你看到普雷吉了吗？ 他笑的像个柴郡猫 还有埃尔维斯…

translation.en: She's just…
Shanti, how's the tea coming?
translation.zh: 尚蒂 茶准备好了吗？

translation.en: What happened? The kettle's not working?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？茶壶不能用吗？

translation.en: I'd like to club these two.
translation.zh: 我真想拿棍子打这个两个人

translation.en: Thank you.
Okay, everyone. We have done the room allocations.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 我们已经分配好房间了

translation.en: So Shanti and Preggie, you will have the main suite.
translation.zh: 尚蒂和普雷吉住主卧套房

translation.en: Elvis and I will be down the hall.
translation.zh: 埃尔维斯和我住走廊那边

translation.en: And Jodi and Prishen, you will be in the room next to us.
translation.zh: 约迪和普里什住我们隔壁

translation.en: That leaves the last bedroom
translation.zh: 现在只剩下最后一间卧室

translation.en: for Aya and Baby.
Put it there, partner.
Look, she's getting over a breakup, and she'll require a bit of privacy, eh?
translation.zh: 听着 她正处于分手的恢复期 需要一点隐私 好吗？

translation.en: Then I also want my own room.
translation.zh: 我也想要我自己的房间

translation.en: Ma, please, just shut it.
translation.zh: 妈妈 好了 别说了

translation.en: Hey, I just don't want anybody to wake up next to my dead body, huh?
translation.zh: 嘿 我可不希望别人一醒来 就看到我的尸体

translation.en: Come on, Jen. Organize something for Baby.
translation.zh: 拜托 詹妮弗 你帮贝贝安排一下

translation.en: Okay, le-- let's try this. Baby, um, you get your own room.
translation.zh: 好 那就这样吧 贝贝 你自己一个房间

translation.en: Um, Jodi, you and Aya can share room.
translation.zh: 约迪 你和阿娅睡一间房

translation.en: And Prishen, you can shack it up with Desan on the couch. Sorted?
translation.zh: 普里什 你跟德桑一起睡沙发 可以吗？

translation.en: Dad, Jodi and I were looking forward to having our own room.
translation.zh: 爸爸 可是我跟约迪想有自己的房间

translation.en: Son, your Auntie came all the way from China.
translation.zh: 儿子 你姑姑可是大老远从中国来的

translation.en: Yeah, but Dad, come on…
Hey, you can rough it up for a few days, right? Come on.
translation.zh: 你这几天可以自己解决 对吧？

translation.en: Wait till you try Baby's chow. Her cooking will give that one a run for her money.
translation.zh: 等你们吃到贝贝做的菜就知道了 她的厨艺可以跟那个人一较高下

translation.en: That one?
Yeah, you. Because not this one.
translation.zh: 对啊 就是你 他说的不是这个人

translation.en: Elvis.
Shall I tell them, or do you wanna tell them?
translation.zh: 要我告诉他们吗？还是你告诉他们？

translation.en: -You tell them. -Okay.
I am moving in with you, guys.
translation.zh: 我要搬去跟你们一起住

translation.en: -Yeah, we know. One week. -Yeah, we know, for one week.
translation.zh: -是啊 我们知道 -是啊 住一个星期

translation.en: No, man. For good. Forever. In Chatsworth.
translation.zh: 不是的 是一直跟你们一起 住在查茨沃斯

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. Keep calm and breathe. Shanti, just breathe. Breathe.
translation.zh: 好了 平静 呼吸 尚蒂 呼吸

translation.en: She's gonna be staying in my house forever, Jen, forever.
translation.zh: 她要一直住在我的房子里 詹妮弗

translation.en: Yeah, but why don't you speak up for yourself?
translation.zh: 可你刚才为什么不说出来呢？

translation.en: -Because he looks so happy about it. -But that's your problem.
translation.zh: 因为他看起来很开心 这就是你的问题

translation.en: You are always thinking of everybody else, never about yourself.
translation.zh: 你总是为别人着想 从来不为你自己考虑

translation.en: What about you? Why can't you tell Elvis that he makes you feel invisible?
translation.zh: 那你呢？你为什么不能告诉埃尔维斯 你觉得自己被忽视了？

translation.en: Are you crazy? I can't do that. I don't want him to think that I am needy.
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？我不能那么做 我不想让他觉得我不自信

translation.en: But it's okay for him to be running after Baby?
translation.zh: 那他总是跟着贝贝也没关系吗？

translation.en: But it's your sister-in-law.
Oh, so now it's my fault?
Exactly. Why don't you tell your family members to stay away from my husband?
translation.zh: 对 你为什么不告诉你的家人 离我丈夫远一点？

translation.en: What are you gonna do about it?
What did you say?
I said, "What are you gonna do about it?"
Really? Why don't you come closer and say that to my face?
translation.zh: 是吗？为什么不靠近点 对着我的脸说？

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come on.
Hey. Hey!
Jen, Jen, Jen! I am so sorry. Are you okay? Are you fine? -Jen, are you okay? -[yells]
translation.zh: 詹妮弗 对不起 你没事吧？

translation.en: [Shanti] I can't see anything!
Let me go!
[Jennifer] This is it. This is it.
Forever, Shanti.
She's gonna be throwing herself at my husband forever.
translation.zh: 她会一直向我丈夫投怀送抱

translation.en: What about me? She's gonna be in my house.
She gonna take over, and Preggie's just gonna let her.
translation.zh: 她会在我家发号施令 普雷吉会放任她这么做

translation.en: Baby must go.
Yeah. Yeah. Let's bounce this Baby before it's too late.
translation.zh: 对 趁现在还来得及 我们赶走贝贝

translation.en: Whatever it takes, let's do this.
translation.zh: 不管要付出什么代价 我们行动吧

translation.en: Oh, my sister…
-Whoa. -Yeah.
-[Prishen] Here we go. -[all] Oh!
Oh! [Prishen] Okay, last one. That's the last one.
translation.zh: 好了 最后一个 这是最后一个

translation.en: -Aya, come on, Aya. -Come on, Aya.
-Your turn now. Come on. -[Aya] No, no, no.
Can you catch nuts with your mouth?
translation.zh: 你们能用嘴接住坚果吗？

translation.en: No, but you look like a pro.
translation.zh: 不能 不过看来你是这方面的高手

translation.en: Come on. Time for our beach walk. Remember?
translation.zh: 走了 沙滩散步的时间到了 记得吗？

translation.en: [Preggie] We got a better idea.
Thirty seconds. And look, it's Baby's favorite.
translation.zh: 给我30秒钟 听着 这是贝贝的最爱

translation.en: Oh, if it's Baby's favorite, we'd love to.
translation.zh: 好吧 既然是贝贝的最爱 我们愿意参加

translation.en: Huh?
[Aya] Okay, Ready? Ready, guys.
Ma, it's where you had your last stroke.
translation.zh: 妈妈 是你上次中风的地方

translation.en: Wild Coast.
Yes! Okay, Shanti.
translation.zh: 对了 好了 尚蒂

translation.en: He sings our favorite song, "Never gonna let…" Come on, Shanti.
translation.zh: 他唱我们最喜欢的那首歌 加油 尚蒂

translation.en: -♪ Never gonna give you up… ♪ -Rick Astley!
Yes, Jodi, thank you. Shanti, please focus.
translation.zh: 约迪 谢谢你 尚蒂 拜托你专心一点

translation.en: I need you to focus, focus.
Time. Come on.
Oh, my poor baby.
Ma, it's so early. Please wake him up.
translation.zh: 妈妈 时间还早 把他叫醒

translation.en: Yeah, but it's not easy. Sleeps like a log, man.
translation.zh: 这可不容易 他睡得很香

translation.en: Um… so Baby, what brings you back to South Africa?
translation.zh: 贝贝 你为什么要回到南非？

translation.en: Uh, well, I just missed my family.
But true, after 12 years, you're only missing them now?
translation.zh: 你过了12年才开始想念你的家人？

translation.en: To be honest, I, uh… I went through a rough period in China and…
translation.zh: 说真的 我在中国过得挺艰难

translation.en: Hey, you don't have to explain anything. You're family, no? And family comes first.
translation.zh: 嘿 什么都不用解释 我们是一家人 家人第一

translation.en: [Elvis] Uh… [clears throat] Whose turn is it?
Our turn. The guys' team.
[whispering] The guys' team.
-Check out the guys' team. -[Baby] You're ready?
translation.zh: 看看男士组吧 准备好了吗？

translation.en: All right. She shares your wife's name, but, uh, yeah, that's about it.
translation.zh: 他跟你妻子同名 就这样

translation.en: -Jennifer Lopez! -Boom!
translation.zh: 詹妮弗洛佩兹 对了

translation.en: I like him.
Okay, Ma, you gotta give us more than that.
translation.zh: 好吧 妈妈 你得多给我们点儿信息

translation.en: -He's handsome, famous… -[Elvis laughs]
Is he an actor, singer? What, Ma?
He does lot of things.
Ma, we're running out of time.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我们快没时间了

translation.en: Oh, what's new?
-Time! -[Prishen laughs]
Eh, you don't know Nelson Mandela or what?
translation.zh: 你们连纳尔逊曼德拉都不知道吗？

translation.en: Okay, Ready. Um… fake Google.
translation.zh: 好了 准备 冒牌的谷歌

translation.en: -Yahoo. -Jodi, stop!
Whose team are you on?
[Prishen] Come on, guys.
Okay, it's uh, K-pop band, girl group, two colors.
translation.zh: 好了 这是个韩国流行乐队 是个女团 名字是两种颜色

translation.en: -Two. -Blackpink?
Yes!
-How did you know that? -I just said the two colors I know.
translation.zh: 怎么会知道？ 我只是随便说了两种我知道的颜色

translation.en: Um, "I feel it in my fingers. I feel it in my toes."
translation.zh: “我的手指感觉到了它 我的脚趾感觉到了它”

translation.en: -Arthritis. -Ma.
Come on. We need one more point, and it's over! Which? Which?
translation.zh: 加油 我们再得一分就结束了 是哪首歌？

translation.en: "Love Is All Around."
-Yes! -Yes. Wow.
[Elvis] Our team!
How, we finished, yeah. [laughs]
-Flattened. -[Preggie] Yes.
I'd like to flatten her.
One, two…
Jodi… are you there?
Yes, Aya.
Come, hold me like I used to hold you when you were small.
translation.zh: 来 抱着我 就像你小时候我抱着你那样

translation.en: How your team lost? [laughs]
Did you come here to…
-Loser, loser. You lost. -I'm not a loser.
translation.zh: -你们输了 输家 -我才不是输家

translation.en: -[sighs] Elvis, finally. -Uh-hmm.
Some alone time.
-Oh, you want some alone time? -Mm-hmm. Okay, I'll go then.
-No. No, no, wait… -[chuckles]
Alone with you.
Ah.
It's been too long. -Far too long. -Mm-hmm.
Take off your shirt.
[Elvis] Oh, baby.
-What? -What?
What did you just say?
"Oh, baby."
Really, Elvis? Is that all you can think about? Baby?
translation.zh: 不是吧 埃尔维斯？ 你满脑子就想着贝贝？

translation.en: I mean from the time we got here, it's just Baby, Baby, Baby, all the time.
translation.zh: 从我们到这儿开始 你就一直围着她转

translation.en: I wasn't thinking about her.
Please, just…
-Hey. -No.
-Just forget it. Forget it. -Jen?
-Someone's coming. -What? I heard someone coming. Get up. Let's go
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -我听见有人来了 快起来

translation.en: You also can't sleep?
[scoffs] Too much coffee.
I'm still a bit jet lagged. At least you can keep me company.
translation.zh: 我还没倒好时差 至少你可以陪陪我

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay.
You want something?
Uh, no. I'm, I'm good. Thanks, Auntie Baby.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢你 贝贝阿姨

translation.en: Auntie Baby? Please, man.
Get rid of her.
I think… I'm trying. I'm trying.
-[Jodi] Why don't you… -Let me think. Let me think.
Can you only think with one head at a time?
translation.zh: 你一次只能用一个头思考吗？

translation.en: [Prishen] I'm sorry.
-Who's under the covers there? -Uh, it's uh, it's D. It's Desan.
translation.zh: 毯子下面是谁？ 是德桑

translation.en: -You want some milk, my boy? -No! He, uh, he wet the bed.
translation.zh: 你要喝牛奶吗？ 不 他会尿床的

translation.en: Oh yeah, shame. I heard about that.
translation.zh: 天啊 真丢脸 我也听说了

translation.en: So, you're a big shot doctor now?
How much do you earn exactly?
[Prishen] Oh!
Oh my God!
Desan, what is wrong with you. I'm so sorry, Auntie Baby.
translation.zh: 德桑 你怎么回事？ 真对不起 贝贝阿姨

translation.en: I'm sorry. He moves around a lot!
translation.zh: 对不起 他睡觉很不老实

translation.en: For a big fellow, he's quite bony, huh?
translation.zh: 他个子这么高 摸着还真瘦

translation.en: [sighs] All right, I think I'm gonna call it a night.
translation.zh: 好吧 我想我还是回去吧 晚安

translation.en: Good night, Auntie Baby.
Good night, Prishen. Good night, Jodi.
translation.zh: 晚安 普里什 晚安 约迪

translation.en: -[Jodi moans] -I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry.
[Shanti] It's not a holiday if you won't take all the free things:
translation.zh: 要是不带走所有免费的东西 就算不上是假期

translation.en: shampoo, conditioner, everything.
translation.zh: 洗发水、护发素 全都带走

translation.en: -Morning! -Oh God!
Look at what you made me do.
[sighs] Well, that's more than what I got last night.
translation.zh: 你比我昨天晚上拿的还多

translation.en: [Shanti] So, this is where Preggie went this morning.
translation.zh: 所以普雷吉今天早上就是去干这个了

translation.en: Exactly. Can you believe they actually cooked for us?
translation.zh: 是啊 你能相信吗？他们真的给我们做饭了

translation.en: -Wow. -[phone rings]
-[Jennifer] Wow. -[Shanti] It's Baby's phone.
-Martin's calling. -Who's Martin?
I don't know.
-Answer it. -No.
-Answer it. -Are you crazy?
No, Jen. Jennifer, stop. Jen, Jen.
translation.zh: 不 詹妮弗 别接

translation.en: Hi.
[Martin] Oh, Baby. Thank God you answered. I miss you.
translation.zh: 贝贝 太好了 你接电话了 我想你

translation.en: Hello, Martin. [quietly] Shh.
[Martin] I'm going crazy, Baby. Please come back. Where are you?
translation.zh: 我要疯了 贝贝 求求你回来 你在哪儿？

translation.en: How could you leave like that?
-Um, uh… -[Martin] I've been worried sick.
I know we've stuff to work out. But please, please…
translation.zh: -我知道我们有事情要解决 -我… 但是求求你…

translation.en: -I'm coming to get you back. -No.
-Jenny, what are you… They're coming. -Would you just…
translation.zh: -詹妮弗 你干什么？他们来了 -你能不能…

translation.en: -[Martin] Listen to me… -[beeps]
Hi.
Hey, hey, hey.
-[Shanti] How are you, guys? -Did you enjoy your sleeping?
translation.zh: 玩得怎么样？ 你们睡得好吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. So how was your game of golf? -[phone rings]
translation.zh: 好 你们高尔夫打得怎么样？

translation.en: -[phone rings] -I think that's my phone.
Phone? Uh… I can't hear any phone.
-[phone rings] -No, it's ringing.
[Shanti] Ringing? No, I can't hear it. Mm-hmm.
I thought I saw a monkey.
translation.zh: 我以为我看到了一只猴子

translation.en: [Jennifer] Hey.
Hey. [chuckles]
Someone's been busy this morning.
So you actually cooked for us.
translation.zh: 你们真的给我们做饭了

translation.en: [Baby] So, as thank you for this morning…
I made breakfast.
[Jodi] Aya?
No.
Tops, Baby. Hm?
Hi.
How was your run?
Was good. I really missed you.
translation.zh: 很好 我真的很想你

translation.en: -Come hop in the shower with me. -[chuckles]
Why don't you just go first? I'm gonna get something from my bag.
translation.zh: 你先去吧 我要从包里拿点东西

translation.en: -Give me two minutes. -[chuckles]
At least you can take a break from the kitchen when Baby moves in.
translation.zh: 等贝贝搬进来了 至少有人能帮你做饭

translation.en: Oh, it would have been nice if the two of you actually cooked for us.
translation.zh: 如果是你们两个为我们做饭 那还挺好的

translation.en: Shanti, she doesn't allow me to cook. Am I right, babe?
translation.zh: 尚蒂 她不准我们做饭 对吧 贝贝？

translation.en: -Would have been a nice surprise. -[Preggie] What's that?
translation.zh: 本来会是个惊喜的 你说什么？

translation.en: -I'm really very… [shouts] -[shouts]
What a lovely surprise. Thank you, Baby.
translation.zh: 真是个美好的惊喜 谢谢你 贝贝

translation.en: See? You don't know what you're missing.
translation.zh: 看到了吧？你不知道自己错过了什么

translation.en: By the look of it… not much.
translation.zh: 从样子上来看 也没错过什么

translation.en: -Ayo. -[Prishen shouts]
Can you do better?
Never. [laughs]
[Jodi] Do you play? Why? Are you shy?
Hey. Sorry about last night.
translation.zh: 嘿 昨晚的事很抱歉

translation.en: Jen, there's people around.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗 周围都是人

translation.en: So?
Why don't we go as couples?
translation.zh: 一对夫妻分一组 好吗？

translation.en: Oh no, no, no. No, no, no.
You and Shanti take the slow boat. Preggs and I are going to race.
translation.zh: 你跟尚蒂坐慢船 我跟普雷吉要比赛

translation.en: Yeah?
Can we, bro?
-[Baby] You guys racing? -[Elvis] Yes.
Ah, I'm so in.
-Take your pick, Baby. -[Elvis] Come on, Baby.
translation.zh: 你去挑船吧 贝贝 来吧 贝贝

translation.en: Eh, like three musketeers we are.
Oh, please.
[Baby] Hey, Elvis, catch me if you can.
translation.zh: 嘿 埃尔维斯 有本事就来抓我

translation.en: And look at that one, gallivanting with my husband.
translation.zh: 你看那个人 在跟我丈夫鬼混

translation.en: [Aya] If I was you, I'd boot her.
translation.zh: 我要是你 我就踢她

translation.en: If she doesn't have any issue with Martin being married then…
translation.zh: 如果她不介意马丁已婚呢？

translation.en: Who's Martin?
translation.zh: -马丁是谁？ -埃尔维斯 如果你想追上我

translation.en: [Baby] Elvis, you need much more stamina that if you want to catch up with me.
translation.zh: -马丁是谁？ -埃尔维斯 如果你想追上我 -还得加把劲儿 -好 我来了

translation.en: [Elvis] Okay, I'm coming.
translation.zh: -还得加把劲儿 -好 我来了

translation.en: Maybe Martin is the one responsible for her rough patch.
translation.zh: 也许是马丁给她带来了困扰？

translation.en: I don't believe any of her stories.
You know what I think we should do?
translation.zh: 你知道我觉得我们应该怎么做吗？

translation.en: I think we need to get her to open up to us.
translation.zh: 我想我们应该让她对我们敞开心扉

translation.en: Then, we can figure out a way to send her packing back to China.
translation.zh: 然后我们就能想办法让她回中国

translation.en: Well, we haven't been the most welcoming to her from the time she arrived.
translation.zh: 从她到这儿开始 我们就不怎么欢迎她

translation.en: I can help you.
Aw, how are you gonna help us?
Everybody comes to me Cause you know what? I've got a trusting face.
translation.zh: 每个人都来找我 知道为什么吗？ 因为我看起来很可靠

translation.en: [chuckles] And I've got Aishwarya Rai face.
translation.zh: 我看起来很像女明星艾西瓦娅雷

translation.en: But she's right because Baby won't suspect a thing from a little old lady.
translation.zh: 不过她说的对 贝贝不会怀疑一个小老太婆

translation.en: Please, don't let that little old lady fool you.
translation.zh: 你可别被小老太婆骗了

translation.en: So, what's in it for me?
Told you. See?
I'll take you to the market.
No, thanks.
But you love the market.
I also love the casino.
Okay, I'll take you extra time to the casino once a week.
translation.zh: 好 那我每周加长一次 带你去赌场的时间

translation.en: Twice a week.
No. One extra hour once a week, and I won't tell Elvis where you were.
translation.zh: 不 一个星期多去一个小时 我不会告诉埃尔维斯你去过哪

translation.en: -Deal. -Fine.
Lot of suitors I got. Must be something about me.
translation.zh: 我有很多追求者 我肯定有什么魅力

translation.en: [chuckles] Aya, you kill me.
Me too. I'm also dying. [laughs]
[Jennifer] No Baby.
We actually have our husbands all to ourselves.
translation.zh: 我们的丈夫都属于我们

translation.en: Exactly.
-Where are they? -[Shanti] Why are they taking so long?
translation.zh: -他们去哪儿了？ -怎么这么久还没回来？

translation.en: What do I tell them?
I think we should stay out of this one, babe.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们还是别管了

translation.en: Okay.
I love you.
Love you too. Bye.
It's so nice of Jennifer to do this, huh? She must be such a kindhearted woman.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗能这样做可真好 她真是个好心的女人

translation.en: Must be. I don't know.
translation.zh: 肯定是吧 我不知道

translation.en: Such a beautiful girl like yourself. Why you not married?
translation.zh: 你这么漂亮 为什么不结婚？

translation.en: Can we have two cocktails, please?
translation.zh: 能给我们两杯鸡尾酒吗？

translation.en: Hey, enough now, man. I am full.
translation.zh: 嘿 够了 我饱了

translation.en: -[Preggie] Hey, Elvis, I’m on. -Pull man, pull.
-I am pulling. -Reel!
-I am reeling. -Come on!
You know what this means?
translation.zh: 你知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: I… I don't know what this means.
Yeah, means your laddie knows nothing.
translation.zh: 意味着你的小伙子什么都不知道

translation.en: Hey…
-[phone rings] -Jennifer.
Not now.
[Elvis] Hey, Love.
Where are you? Are you guys at the beach?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿？你们在沙滩上吗？

translation.en: [Elvis] No, we are at the shop.
Yeah, yeah, this lady got a bit sick and Prishen doesn't wanna take any chances.
translation.zh: 这位女士有点不舒服 普里什可不想冒险

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
[Elvis] It's funny, man. We wanted to spend some time with you
translation.zh: 我们想跟你们一起野餐

translation.en: at the picnic, but, love, seems like we can't make it, huh?
translation.zh: 我们想跟你们一起野餐 但是 亲爱的 看来我们去不了了

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it.
Okay, love. Bye.
translation.zh: 好了 亲爱的 再见

translation.en: Bro, it's a shark, man.
translation.zh: 兄弟 这肯定是一条鲨鱼

translation.en: -[Elvis] Huh? -A shark.
What's going on?
What?
All this time in China, no one's chopsticks you liked?
translation.zh: 在中国待了这么久 就没有你喜欢的筷子吗？

translation.en: Hey, you're terrible. [chuckles]
But not one person read your fortune cookie?
translation.zh: 没有人读过你的幸运饼干吗？

translation.en: Thank God. Here, drink this.
translation.zh: 太好了 来吧 喝酒

translation.en: -What's this? -Just taste it.
Mm…
Nice. Hey, I have been wasting my time drinking coconut water all this time.
translation.zh: 好喝 我一直都在浪费时间喝椰子汁

translation.en: The casino is just a few minutes away. What you say, Aya?
translation.zh: 走几分钟就能到赌场 你觉得怎么样 阿娅？

translation.en: Hey, Elvis don't like when I go, huh?
translation.zh: 嘿 埃尔维斯不喜欢我去赌场

translation.en: I won't say if you won't.
translation.zh: 如果你不说 我也不会说

translation.en: Cheers.
[Elvis] So, uh, what you told Jodi about where we are?
[Prishen] I told her the truth, Uncle Elvis.
translation.zh: 我跟她说了真话 埃尔维斯叔叔

translation.en: Hey, what's wrong with you?
[sighs] She won't tell anyone if that's what you are worried about.
translation.zh: 她不会告诉别人的 如果你担心这个的话

translation.en: [chuckles] That's my laddie.
Dad, the truth, like a dead fish, always finds its way to the surface.
translation.zh: 爸爸 真相就像一条死鱼 早晚会付出水面的

translation.en: Hey, laddie… you mustn't worry about the truth.
translation.zh: 嘿 小子 别担心真相了

translation.en: You must focus on keeping the peace.
You see, if you keep the peace, you extend the marriage lease.
translation.zh: 当你能维持和平 婚姻就能长久

translation.en: Sometimes, the truth gets in the way.
translation.zh: 有时真相会阻碍你的和平之路

translation.en: I totally disagree, Uncle Elvis.
translation.zh: 我完全不同意 埃尔维斯叔叔

translation.en: Cool. Preggs, he totally disagrees.
Ooh, using big man's words, huh?
Come on, I mean, we've been watching the way you and Prishen look at each other.
translation.zh: 好了 我们都看到你跟普里什 看对方的眼神了

translation.en: With bedroom eyes.
What?
Bedroom eyes, man.
Like when you are in the mood to do rude.
translation.zh: 就像你准备狂野做爱时的眼神

translation.en: What?
[Jennifer] You look like you're constipated.
translation.zh: 看你的表情像便秘了一样

translation.en: Hey, we saw how you always turn to Jodi to check for everything.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们看到 你总是什么事都跟约迪汇报

translation.en: Yeah.
See, I will be Jodi, right? Come here, come here. Come close.
translation.zh: 来 现在我是约迪 过来 靠近点

translation.en: -Closer, closer. -Hey Elvis, now I hold.
translation.zh: -再靠近点 -嘿 埃尔维斯 我握着他

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
What you say, Prishen?
Can I go to the shop? Can I go to the gym?
translation.zh: 我能去商店吗？我能去健身房吗？

translation.en: -Ah, we don't sound like that. -Yeah.
-Come here. Come here. -Go, go.
Tighter, tighter.
-Tighter, right? Close enough? -Hmm!
-What you say, Prishen? [kisses] -[laughing]
Can I sleep now?
Can I eat now? Can I drink now? Tell me what to do now.
translation.zh: 我能吃东西吗？我能喝东西吗？ 告诉我我现在要做什么

translation.en: -I don't sound like that. -Hey, hey, hey.
translation.zh: -我才不是这样呢 -嘿 嘿 我们两个可是亲眼看见了

translation.en: We saw with our own two eyes how you turn and check with Jodi for everything.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们两个可是亲眼看见了 你什么事都要转过头去问约迪

translation.en: Yeah.
-Your neck is not sprained, laddie? -Huh?
-Swing, swing, swing. -Swing, swing, swing.
[Elvis] We were so convincing. We said that the lady was sick.
translation.zh: 我们的理由很有说服力 我们说因为一位女士病了

translation.en: He was even making the sounds of a sick lady.
translation.zh: 他甚至还装出了病人的声音

translation.en: Save me! Quick!
-Hey. -Hi.
What are you laughing at?
Lucky, I marinated extra meat, huh?
That fish you've bought is so small.
Exactly. So why would you guys even buy them?
translation.zh: 是啊 你们为什么要买这么小的鱼？

translation.en: You all can't choose. That's the problem. Look at this. This looks like sardines.
translation.zh: 你们都不会挑 这就是问题 你们看这条 跟沙丁鱼似的

translation.en: Except for this one.
-Yeah. -This one's a decent size.
Hey, that's the one I caught.
You caught?
Come on, Shanti. Let's go. I suddenly lost my appetite.
translation.zh: 走吧 尚蒂 我突然没胃口了

translation.en: So, uh, Dad… [clears throat] How's the neck there? Feeling sprained?
translation.zh: 爸爸 你的脖子感觉怎么样？ 扭伤了吗？

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey.
-This Baby will be the death of me. -[grunts]
She comes back to Chatsworth with us, we are finished.
translation.zh: 她要和我们回查茨沃斯 我们就完蛋了

translation.en: What a thing.
And?
I have big ears.
What did you find out, Aya?
translation.zh: 你查到了什么 阿娅？

translation.en: I don't know. -What you found out? -What did I tell you?
translation.zh: 我不知道 你们查到了什么？

translation.en: She's always like that. All talk, no action.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过吧？她总是这样 只会说 不会做

translation.en: Something biting me.
What's this? [grunts]
This is Martin's number.
What?
Hello, Baby?
[Jennifer] Hi, is that Martin?
-Yeah, it's Martin. -[Jennifer] My name is…
translation.zh: 对 我是马丁 我是迪拜国际机场的金伯莉

translation.en: Um, Kimberley, from Dubai International Airport.
translation.zh: 我是迪拜国际机场的金伯莉

translation.en: Uh, we happened to find your contact details in a purse.
translation.zh: 我们在一个钱包里 找到了你的联系方式

translation.en: And I… I was wondering if perhaps you know any female traveler
translation.zh: 我们想问一下你是否认识一个

translation.en: who might be going to South Africa?
My girlfriend. Is she in South Africa?
translation.zh: 天啊 是我女朋友 她现在在南非？

translation.en: She just left without a trace, and…
translation.zh: 她就这么离开了 一点踪迹都没有

translation.en: I'm actually at her apartment now. I was hoping…
translation.zh: 我现在就在她的公寓里 我一直希望着…

translation.en: She won't even know anyone there.
Well, I am so sorry to bother you, sir.
translation.zh: 真抱歉打扰你了 先生

translation.en: [Martin] I don't know what to do. I wish I knew what I did wrong.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么做 我真想知道我哪里做错了

translation.en: -I don't have a chance with her now. -Pathetic.
translation.zh: 我现在没有机会跟她在一起了 真可怜

translation.en: Now she's ignoring me.
Oh my God.
-[Shanti] I just love your accent. -Thanks.
She talks like that to the whites too.
I am feeling for a nice cup of tea.
Hmm. Me too.
Bro… wanna have some tea? Shanti's making.
translation.zh: 兄弟 要喝茶吗？尚蒂去弄

translation.en: Yeah, and some samosas too.
translation.zh: 好啊 再来一点咖喱角

translation.en: [Preggie] Shh.
Top idea, bro.
Preggie, why don't you make the tea?
translation.zh: 普雷吉 你为什么不去泡茶？

translation.en: Me? I've never made a cup of tea in my life. Ask Shanti.
translation.zh: 我？我这辈子都没泡过一杯茶 让尚蒂去弄

translation.en: Going for a power walk.
-Hey, what happened? -[Jennifer] I am going to help Shanti.
translation.zh: 嘿 怎么了？ 我去帮尚蒂

translation.en: Okay.
Okay, listen. You just follow my lead.
Where are you going?
Fishing.
We can fish?
Just walk.
Hmm.
They are punishing us.
Come on, walk faster, Shanti.
translation.zh: 走 走快点儿 尚蒂

translation.en: I'm walking. I'm walking.
-We are gonna miss her. -I can't walk any faster.
translation.zh: -我们跟不上她了 -我不能再快了

translation.en: Shanti, Shanti, we are gonna miss her.
translation.zh: 尚蒂 我们跟不上她了

translation.en: Few more steps, and I won't reach my 50th. [panting]
translation.zh: 再多走几步我就活不到50岁生日了

translation.en: Okay, breathe. Just a little more. Just a little more.
translation.zh: 呼吸 再快点儿 再往前走一点

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait.
-Wait. What you doing with the binoculars? -Shh.
translation.zh: -等等 你拿望远镜干什么？ -别说话

translation.en: I told you I enjoy bird watching. Wait, wait.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过我喜欢观鸟 等着

translation.en: [Jennifer] Oh my… She's on the phone. Wonder who she's talking to?
translation.zh: 天啊 她在打电话 不知道她在跟谁说话

translation.en: You think she is talking to Martin?
How would I know? They're binoculars, not an earpiece.
translation.zh: 我怎么会知道？望远镜只能望远 又不能听远

translation.en: Okay, quickly. We have to move closer.
translation.zh: 快点 我们得再靠近点儿

translation.en: Keep them out.
Just move.
Walk, come on. Just a little. Just near this tree. Here, here.
My purse? How did they get your number?
translation.zh: 我的钱包？ 他们怎么会知道你的号码？

translation.en: Yes, you are, but they must've made a mistake, cause I have all my stuff here.
translation.zh: 对 但他们肯定搞错了 我没弄丢东西

translation.en: Anyway listen, when I am back, there must be no ring on your finger.
translation.zh: 听我说 等我回去之后 你的手上不能有戒指

translation.en: -She's going back to China. [chuckles] -Shut up!
translation.zh: 她要回中国 小声点

translation.en: Just hold on.
Damn, now look, she heard us. Make a sound of a bird or something.
translation.zh: 你看吧 被她听到了 你学一下鸟叫

translation.en: You're the bird-watching expert. You make.
translation.zh: 你才是观鸟专家 你来学

translation.en: Okay, wait.
Hello?
-What was that? -Shh. I am warming up.
Is somebody there?
What was that?
It was a hadeda.
God, it sounds like a hyena.
Can you do any better?
Hello?
What kind of a chicken is that? Sounds disturbed.
translation.zh: 你学的是什么鸡呀？简直是噪音

translation.en: -[Shanti] Chicken? -Shh.
Sorry about that.
Stop tickling my toes.
Shanti, my hands are in front of me. How can I be…
translation.zh: 尚蒂 我的手在前面 我怎么可能…

translation.en: Okay. Shh, shh.
-[grunts] -Shh.
It's gone. It's gone. Shh, shh, shh.
-Yeah. I… I will call you back, okay? -[shushing] Calm down.
translation.zh: -好 我会再打给你的 好吗？ -嘘 冷静

translation.en: Listen, listen…
Is somebody there?
-Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. -Stop. [chuckles]
She's gone.
Hey, I told you, you mustn't stop.
translation.zh: 嘿 我告诉过你不要停

translation.en: Hello, Prishen.
-Oh shame… -[Baby] Morning, family.
Okay, today, we are all yours.
translation.zh: 好了 今天我们会一直陪着你们

translation.en: Well, because we love you guys so much, we booked you a round of golf for today.
translation.zh: 我们很爱你们 所以给你们定了高尔夫场地

translation.en: You can be my caddie.
Oh sorry, I only booked for three, but you are welcome to play tennis with us.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我只定了三个人的 不过你可以跟我们一起打网球

translation.en: Um, she can have my space. I'm gonna hang back and look after Jodi.
translation.zh: 她可以去 因为我要留下来照顾约迪

translation.en: What?
Well, I… I… I guess that settles that then.
You go play golf, and Shanti and I will play tennis.
translation.zh: 你们去打高尔夫 我跟尚蒂去打网球

translation.en: -I'll come with you all. -And do what?
translation.zh: 我跟你们一起 你来干什么？

translation.en: Aya, Aya, take Desan with you.
translation.zh: 阿娅 带德桑一起去

translation.en: Oh, I know why. Desan, you are coming with us.
translation.zh: 我知道为什么 德桑 你跟我们一起

translation.en: You don't come, I will tell them you pee in your bed.
translation.zh: 你要是不来 我就告诉他们你尿床

translation.en: You know, I've never seen much in… in the bathroom, huh?
translation.zh: 我从没在浴室看到过那么…

translation.en: But Jodi, take it easy. One wrong move, and someone gonna get hurt.
translation.zh: 约迪 慢慢来 否则可能有人受伤

translation.en: And I thought you had a big nose.
translation.zh: 我之前还以为你只有鼻子大

translation.en: [Preggie] Okay, you ready? Soft hands. Head down.
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？双手放松 低头

translation.en: Wiggle, wiggle, wiggle. All right, gently back.
translation.zh: 扭动身体 背部放松

translation.en: There you go.
Yeah! [chuckles]
-What a shot! Well done. -It's a sign.
translation.zh: 打得好 这预示着我的新生意会取得成功 我就知道会成功

translation.en: My new business is gonna be such a success. I just know it.
translation.zh: 这预示着我的新生意会取得成功 我就知道会成功

translation.en: [Shanti] Wait. Wait.
Offside.
Baby this, Baby that. I am sick of it.
translation.zh: 这个贝贝阴魂不散 我受够了

translation.en: Really?
I mean, she is blatantly, blatantly trying to get on with Elvis.
translation.zh: 她就是公然要和埃尔维斯在一起

translation.en: [Aya] Free kick.
Where's the ball?
You know what I'd like to do, Shanti? You know what I wanna do?
translation.zh: 尚蒂 你知道我想干什么吗？

translation.en: I wanna smack her across the face with this racket.
translation.zh: 我想用这个球拍打她的脸

translation.en: I mean, here we are. We stuck here, and that golf stick is busy with our husbands.
translation.zh: 你看 我们被困在这里 那个高尔夫白痴却缠着我们的丈夫

translation.en: Penalty.
Know what? Why don't you calm down and let me get a shot in?
translation.zh: 你能不能冷静一点？给我个机会

translation.en: And the worst part, the worst part is…
is that Elvis is enjoying every single minute of it.
translation.zh: 埃尔维斯还非常享受这种时刻

translation.en: [Aya] Objection. Overruled.
-You know what? I can't do this anymore. -[Aya] Sustained.
translation.zh: -你知道吗？我打不下去了 -反对有效 我打不下去了

translation.en: Desan, come and take over here.
Racket abuse.
[Aya] Substitution.
Foul ball.
-No balls. -[Desan grunts]
-You know… -Hmm?
We, uh, have a little more time.
The moms are gonna come looking for us.
So?
Aya, you know what to do?
translation.zh: 阿娅 你知道该做什么？

translation.en: Yes, yes, I know, man.
No, say it. I wanna hear you say it. What is your cue?
translation.zh: 你要说出来 我要听到你说出来 暗号是什么？

translation.en: Sprinkle water. You see? I know it.
translation.zh: 洒水 看到了吧？我知道的

translation.en: [exhales] Baby.
Like the doctor said, we have to run a few more tests.
translation.zh: 就像医生说的 我们得再做几项检查

translation.en: Think about it. Just makes sense now. I can't get pregnant.
translation.zh: 你想想 现在就说得通了 我没法怀孕

translation.en: Hey, come here.
Look at me.
We are gonna be okay. It's gonna be okay.
-It's gonna be okay. -[cries]
It's gonna be okay.
Why it took you so long?
translation.zh: 你们怎么这么久才回来？

translation.en: [Shanti] Go change, Desan.
Hey.
Looks like his pee problem is getting worse.
translation.zh: 看来他尿床的问题更严重了

translation.en: [Aya] How are you feeling, Jodi?
translation.zh: 你感觉怎么样 约迪？

translation.en: She's okay. Ma, we're just going for a drive.
translation.zh: 他没事 妈妈 我们出去兜兜风

translation.en: [mouthing] Go.
[mouthing] Go.
Go. Go.
Go now.
Where?
Oh yeah. [chuckles]
[Baby] Come in.
What's wrong, Aya?
Oh, the way my head is paining.
Oh, have I got tablets for you.
translation.zh: 我给你拿药 很管用的

translation.en: So you know, when I have a headache, I'll take a mixture.
So it will take your headache away, and it will make you so happy…
translation.zh: 可以止痛 还会让你感到快乐

translation.en: like you just hit the jackpot at the casino.
translation.zh: 就像在赌场中了头彩一样

translation.en: See… that should do it.
Oh my God! Aya! Somebody, help! Aya!
translation.zh: 天啊 阿娅 快来人帮帮忙

translation.en: What's wrong? Oh my God. Prishen, Elvis, Preggie!
translation.zh: 怎么了？天啊 普里什 埃尔维斯 普雷吉

translation.en: Ma, you okay?
This can't be happening!
[Elvis] Ma.
Ma? Just help me with her. Ma, can you hear me, Ma?
translation.zh: 妈妈 帮我扶她一下 你能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: Ma, can you hear me?
Pregs, go call the ambulance.
Not on my birthday weekend!
translation.zh: 你别在我的生日周末上出事啊

translation.en: Let me sprinkle some water.
Sprinkle some water.
Aya?
[Jennifer] Ma.
Jen, sprinkle some more water.
I am sprinkling water. I am sprinkling more water.
translation.zh: 我在洒水 我又洒了点水

translation.en: Jen?
[Shanti] Aya?
Aya?
Ma?
-Thanks for coming. -Thanks, guy.
Where's my Oscar? How was my performance?
translation.zh: 我的奥斯卡奖呢？我演得怎么样？

translation.en: You really overdid it.
Your voice was shaking. I thought you were gonna cry.
translation.zh: 你的声音都颤抖了 我还以为你要哭了

translation.en: She did cry. Anyway, did you see the suitcase code?
translation.zh: 她真的哭了 你看到她行李箱的密码了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, I saw. -And?
I don't know. I need some help remembering.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我需要点帮助才能想起来

translation.en: Ma.
Saras must also come to the casino.
translation.zh: 必须让萨拉斯一起来赌场

translation.en: Fine, done. Now what's the first number?
translation.zh: 好 第一个数字是什么？

translation.en: -Seven. -Seven.
-[Jennifer] And the second one? -Uh-huh.
Wait, it's such a blur.
translation.zh: 等等 有点想不起来

translation.en: Okay, a hundred grand extra spending money.
translation.zh: 好 再多给你100块零花钱 第二个数字是什么？

translation.en: -Now what's the second one? -Three.
translation.zh: 好 再多给你100块零花钱 第二个数字是什么？ 三

translation.en: -Three. -Perfect. And the third one?
It's on the tip of my tongue.
-One? -No.
-Two? -Not two.
-Okay, three? -[Jennifer] Shanti, just hold on.
translation.zh: 好吧 三？ 尚蒂 等一下

translation.en: What more could you possibly want, Ma?
-First promise you'll go for it… -[Jennifer] Fine, I promise.
translation.zh: -你要答应我会去… -好 我答应

translation.en: -Now, what's the third number? -Nine.
translation.zh: 好了 第三个数字是什么？ 九

translation.en: And what she must promise, she must go to?
Cooking lessons.
[Elvis] If you ladies want to come, we're going to the pool.
translation.zh: 我们要去游泳池 你们想来吗？

translation.en: [Jennifer] Who's going?
[Elvis] Well, just us, Desan and Baby.
translation.zh: 就我们 还有德桑和贝贝

translation.en: Um, no, you guys carry on. We will stay here with Aya.
translation.zh: 不了 你们去吧 我们要在这儿陪阿娅

translation.en: [whispering] They're gone. They're gone. Right.
[Jennifer] Okay. Right. Here we go.
Slowly, wait. I'll take this out.
translation.zh: 慢点 我把这个拿出来

translation.en: Okay.
Traffic light bra this.

-[Jennifer] Hip-hip… -[all] Hooray!

-Hey, come. Do something for her. -Hey, I am not much of a speaker.

Jen.

Is she having the baby?

You broke me.
That's what you did.
Really, I can't believe I acted like that.

translation.en: -to deserve being treated that way. What? -No, no, Jen. No.

Jen… Hey.
Just stop, stop.
Just stop, Elvis. Stop. [sniffles]
I just need… I need time. I need space. I need… [sniffles]

translation.en: Jen, Jen, I… I can give you all that. I can. Just please…

Jen, we've… We've done everything together. We…

I can change.
[hesitates] I will change, I promise. It won't happen again.

translation.en: Jen… -[sniffs] -[Elvis] I can't lose you, Jen. I can't.

translation.en: Jen…
Are you crying?
Elvis… -[sobs] -[Jennifer] Are you…
Elvis, I've never seen you cry before.

translation.en: That's because I've never almost lost you before.

translation.en: Elvis…
Elvis…
-Come here. Come here. -[sniffs]
-Jen. -[Jennifer] It's okay. It's okay.
Desan, ask your daddy if he wants tea.

I hope it's good.
I took you for granted.

I'm so sorry.
No more assuming anything before talking to you, okay?

I'll always make tea for you.
That's pushing it.
Hey, there's one more thing.
Oh my God. Did you cook?
Happy Birthday, Shanti Naidoo.

[in English] Good evening and welcome to the Diwali festival.

translation.en: Thank you, my friend. Thank you.
Well, they've taken some heavy-duty polishing,
translation.zh: 他们的确需要大量的抛光

translation.en: but deep down, we know we married two diamonds in the rough.
translation.zh: 但我们内心深处很清楚 我们嫁给了两颗未经打磨的钻石

translation.en: Deep down, you all know you married two bloody badass.
translation.zh: 你们很清楚你们嫁给了两个笨蛋

translation.en: What?
[Jennifer] Nothing. Nothing.
[Aya] Marriage is a funny thing, eh? Sometimes, it stays strong.
translation.zh: 婚姻很有趣 有时 婚姻很强大

translation.en: And sometimes, the light of marriage gets blown out by the wind.
translation.zh: 有时 婚姻的光芒被风吹走了

translation.en: But one thing for sure: true love will never lose its spark.
translation.zh: 但有一件事可以肯定 那就是真爱永远不会失去火花

translation.en: But when it's light, there will be dark times.
translation.zh: 但生活中一定会有黑暗的时刻

translation.en: But these are the moments that make you hold on tighter to your partner.
translation.zh: 但正是这些时刻让你和伴侣抱得更紧

translation.en: Cherish them. Appreciate them.
translation.zh: 珍惜他们 欣赏他们 无论如何

translation.en: Always let each other know exactly how you feel no matter what.
translation.zh: 要一直让他们明白你的感受

translation.en: To all the couples out there,
be the oil in each other's lamp, because when it's burning bright,
translation.zh: 都能做彼此的灯油 这样当灯放光时

translation.en: even the darkest of spaces don't stand a chance.
translation.zh: 即使是最黑暗的角落也有希望

translation.en: That's top marriage for you.
♪ I get lost in a crazy time with you ♪
♪ It's just different phases ♪
♪ Till the morning breaks the day ♪
♪ It's all right, yeah ♪
♪ Oh, it's all night ♪
